page.title: 06Llanddulas male voice choir
page.content: Llanddulas has quite a large choir run by J.Meirion Davies who is the musical director.The choir has been going for 31 years and 3 of the original are still with it,including the conductor. They have toured Dublin,America and Germany.The choir have just recorded a programme of Treasure Hunt with Anneka Rice, for January 1986. We have recently been to see the choir in St.Cynbryd's church in Llanddulas. They sang to raise money for the National Eisteddfod,Rhyl 1985 Nearly two hundred pounds was raised.J.Meirion Davies became assistant organist at his village chapel.Later he became the director of Llanddulas choir.The choir sings songs like Bright Eyes, My Way and some religious,Welsh,opera and spirituals.Men from all around Colwyn Bay and Llanddulas come to sing.
